title: Calories in Miller Lite
meta_description: Learn calories in Miller Lite per 12 oz serving, plus carbs, protein, sodium, and tweaks for different sizes or variations.
assumptions: Standard 12 fl oz (355 ml) bottle or can; light lager beer, no additives.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by batch, serving size, and brand specifics; alcohol content affects totals. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: One 12 oz Miller Lite contains 96 calories and 3.2 g carbs.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Compared to regular Miller High Life (per 12 oz)

faqs.q: How many calories in Miller Lite per bottle?
faqs.a: 96 calories in a standard 12 oz bottle of Miller Lite.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in Miller Lite?
faqs.a: About 3.2 g of carbohydrates per 12 oz serving, with 0 g fiber and sugars.

faqs.q: Does Miller Lite have protein or fat?
faqs.a: Trace protein (~0.7 g) and 0 g fat per 12 oz serving.

faqs.q: How much sodium is in Miller Lite?
faqs.a: Approximately 10 mg of sodium per 12 oz serving.

faqs.q: Is Miller Lite low calorie compared to other beers?
faqs.a: Yes, at 96 kcal per 12 oz, it's lower than many regular beers (e.g., 140+ kcal).
